document.full_text: egypt's police, whose credibility was shattered for using excessive force against anti-government protesters who toppled president hosni mubarak from power, will give more focus to human rights, the government said on friday.
document.title: in new egypt, police talk to human rights groups
lines_and_colors: egypt's police, whose credibility was shattered for using excessive force against anti-government protesters who toppled president hosni mubarak from power, will give more focus to human rights, the government said on friday.
